short_summary: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENTThe Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.
description: The tender will be open to all qualified suppliers who wish to submit a bid. Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected. The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
tags: Oils and greases, cutting, lubricating, and hydraulic
